dict.acceptation: 归因于…；使求助于；送交；认为…起源于；

sent.orig: I again refer people with a greater interest in gulls to refer to other sources.
sent.trans: 我再次提醒，对亚成鸟辨识有更强烈兴趣的鸟友最好参考其他资讯来源。

sent.orig: Note:Data from World Bank.Refer to 2001.Refer to 2002.
sent.trans: 注：数据来源于世界银行。2001年数字。2002年数字。

sent.orig: The Current Corporate Communications refer to the publication of the 2010 Interim Report of the Company.
sent.trans: 本申请表格所提及之本次公司通讯文件指2010年中期业绩报告。

sent.orig: Carried out a copy of the bmp picture can refer to the procedure!
sent.trans: 一个可进行对bmp图片复制的程序可以参考！

sent.orig: Sunshine Hours refer to the actual hours of sun irradiating the earth.
sent.trans: 指太阳实际照射地面的时间。
